title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Major David Alfasi, Major Ely Levy, Sergeant Eyal Mabourach Toito – Updates on Casualties and Injured Soldiers”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the names of three IDF casualties whose families have been notified: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC2201202467324583456

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and photos of the fallen are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In the combat in which Major David Alfasi, Major Ely Levy and Sergeant Eyal Mabourach Toito fell, another soldier from Battalion 202, Paratroopers Brigade, was seriously wounded.

In addition, two combatants in the 603rd Engineering Corps, from the ‘Stormy Golan’ (7) formation, were seriously injured in combat in the south of the Gaza Strip.

The wounded were taken for medical treatment in hospitals, their families have been updated.
